FuncDef: This command specifies the import routing policy to be used. Only a single policy can be imported at a time.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the import policy name. Allowed values are any string up to 32 characters long composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes. Routing policies are configured in the config>router>policy-options context The router policy must be defined before it can be imported.
